attributes.action: Make Abbeymead Contoured Park Dirt Jumps!
attributes.additional_details: As it will help Mountain Bikers all ages to be able to use Dirt Jumps/ Mountain Bike Trails.
attributes.background: Help us get Council Permission (Gloucester Council) to build Dirt Jumps.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about locally maintained parks are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
